project.name: Clone My Space
project.description: Clone My Space is software for Windows, Mac, and Linux that allows users to connect to an online website. Developed in Python, it uses Tkinter to create a user-friendly interface. This project demonstrates the basic principles of client-server architecture and user authentication.
project.functionality: Verifies user credentials via a PHP API. Users enter their username and password into a form, which, when submitted, sends a POST request to a remote server. The PHP server checks the credentials and returns a success or error message.
